If healthcare reform is enacted that contains a public option:
 
 Who's going to pay for it?
 
 How are they going to pay for it?
 
 Simple questions. You'd think there'd be a simple answer.
 
 As the OP, I will determine a winner to any following arguments. So those who read cannot argue that I have a predetermined outcome, I will state a very straightforward mechanism as to how I will determine a "winner".
 
 It's a very simple method used to determine who "wins".
 
 The person who answers the above "simple" questions with the fewest words....wins.
 
 Simple answers for simple questions.
